attributes.action: Stop The Benefit Cuts To Our Poorest In Society
attributes.additional_details:
Mr Cameron
                   We demand that your government stop your destructive and heartless cuts in benefits to the poorest in our society,ie,The bedroom Tax which is now causing great distress,even to those that voted you into power.Heartache and misery is being felt far and wide because of these cuts,which MUST have been passed by YOU.We,the voters of this countrywill surely remember the misery your government has inflicted upon us unless these cuts are scrapped.
